original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)🔽23.14. Kusalattika, Micchattaniyatattika🔽Nakusalaṁ namicchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā akusalo micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nakusalaṁ nasammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi  kusala ttika  na kusalam na micchatta niyatam dhammam paccayā akusalaḥ micchatta niyataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  na kusalam na sammatta niyatam dhammam paccayā kusalaḥ sammatta niyataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: The Dhamma Paccanīyānuloma, Tikatika Paṭṭhānapāḷi🔽.. The wholesome triad, the triad of the undetermined by wrongness

original: Nakusalaṁ naaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na kusalam na aniyatam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ aniyataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca adhipatiyā pañca pe avigate pañca
translated: With an unwholesome, undetermined by wrongness, as condition, a wholesome, undetermined by wrongness, is produced by way of condition as root-cause condition. (In brief.) With root-cause as condition, three. … With ignorance as condition, three. … With the unwholesome as condition, the wholesome is produced by way of condition as root-cause condition. (In brief.) With root-cause as condition, three. … With the unwholesome as condition, the undetermined is produced by way of condition as root-cause condition. (In brief.) With root-cause as condition, five. … With the unwholesome as condition, the unwholesome and the undetermined are produced by way of condition as root-cause condition. (In brief.) With root-cause as condition, five. … With the unwholesome as condition, the wholesome is produced by way of condition as object condition. (In brief.) With object as condition, five. … With the unwholesome as condition, the wholesome and the undetermined are produced by way of condition as object condition. (In brief.) With object as condition, five. … With the unwholesome as condition, the wholesome and the unwholesome are produced by way of condition as object condition. (In brief.) With object as condition, five. … With the unwholesome as condition, the wholesome, the unwholesome and the undetermined are produced by way of condition as object condition. (In brief.)
